member.name: T:Bmi.BmiCalculator
member.summary: This class offers methods for evaluating the health status based on weight and height of someone. Class nay cung cap cac ham de tinh toan chi so suc khoe dua tren chieu cao va can nang.

member.name: M:Bmi.BmiCalculator.GetBmi(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: This method return the bmi indicator based on weight and height
